PageTitle: Corporate network for team collaboration | ONLYOFFICE
PageDescription: Improve your team collaboration with blogs, forums, bookmarks, wiki.
HeroText:
Easy-to-use software with an array of business-friendly collaboration features
<1>By PCMag
SharingCompanyNewsText: Create a corporate news board for posting the latest company news, orders, and announcements. Add and share bookmarks to useful or interesting resources with your colleagues.
CreatingPollsText: Conduct research, gather data, or get feedback from other office users with polls and surveys. Add questionnaires to make forum posts more interactive.
MaintainingBlogsText: Add posts to the corporate blog to share ideas, knowledge, and experience with others. Discuss issues and lead forum discussions.
InstantMessagingText: Communicate with other users in real-time, organize conferences in chat rooms, and use mailing lists to send a message to many people simultaneously.
EasyToUse: Easy-to-use software with an array of business-friendly collaboration features.
